View Javadoc
1   package test.external;
2   
3   import static org.assertj.core.api.Assertions.assertThat;
4   import static org.assertj.core.api.Assertions.fail;
5   import static org.junit.Assert.*;
6   
7   import java.io.File;
8   import java.nio.charset.Charset;
9   import java.nio.file.Files;
10  import java.util.List;
11  
12  import org.junit.BeforeClass;
13  import org.junit.Test;
14  import org.supercsv.exception.SuperCsvException;
15  import org.supercsv.prefs.CsvPreference;
16  
17  import com.github.mygreen.supercsv.annotation.CsvBean;
18  import com.github.mygreen.supercsv.annotation.CsvColumn;
19  import com.github.mygreen.supercsv.exception.SuperCsvInvalidAnnotationException;
20  import com.github.mygreen.supercsv.io.CsvAnnotationBeanReader;
21  
22  
23  /**
24   * 外部パッケージのテスト
25   *
26   * @author T.TSUCHIE
27   *
28   */
29  public class ExternalTest {
30      
31      @BeforeClass
32      public static void setup() {
33          // パッケージの許可設定はなくても使用可能。
34  //        System.setProperty("supercsv.annotation.jexlPermissions", "test.external.*");
35      }
36      
37      @Test
38      public void testReadNormal() throws Exception {
39          
40          File file = new File("src/test/data/test_read_external_normal.csv");
41          
42          CsvAnnotationBeanReader<ExternalCsv> csvReader = new CsvAnnotationBeanReader<>(ExternalCsv.class,
43                  Files.newBufferedReader(file.toPath(), Charset.forName("UTF-8")),
44                  CsvPreference.STANDARD_PREFERENCE);
45          
46          List<ExternalCsv> list = csvReader.readAll();
47          assertThat(list).hasSize(2);
48          assertThat(csvReader.getErrorMessages()).hasSize(0);
49  
50          csvReader.close();
51          
52      }
53  
54      @Test
55      public void testReadValidationError_Enum() throws Exception {
56          
57          File file = new File("src/test/data/test_read_external_error_enum.csv");
58          
59          CsvAnnotationBeanReader<ExternalCsv> csvReader = new CsvAnnotationBeanReader<>(ExternalCsv.class,
60                  Files.newBufferedReader(file.toPath(), Charset.forName("UTF-8")),
61                  CsvPreference.STANDARD_PREFERENCE);
62          
63          try {
64              csvReader.readAll();
65              fail("not error");
66          
67          } catch(SuperCsvException e) {
68              
69              List<String> errors = csvReader.getErrorMessages();
70              assertThat(errors).hasSize(1);
71              assertThat(errors.get(0)).isEqualTo("[2行, 4列] : 項目「ロール」の値（aaa）は、何れかの値「Admin, Developer, Repoter」である必要があります。");
72              
73          } finally {
74              csvReader.close();
75          }
76          
77      }
78      
79      @Test
80      public void testReadValidationError_CustomType() throws Exception {
81          
82          File file = new File("src/test/data/test_read_external_error_type.csv");
83          
84          CsvAnnotationBeanReader<ExternalCsv> csvReader = new CsvAnnotationBeanReader<>(ExternalCsv.class,
85                  Files.newBufferedReader(file.toPath(), Charset.forName("UTF-8")),
86                  CsvPreference.STANDARD_PREFERENCE);
87          
88          try {
89              csvReader.readAll();
90              fail("not error");
91          
92          } catch(SuperCsvException e) {
93              
94              List<String> errors = csvReader.getErrorMessages();
95              assertThat(errors).hasSize(1);
96              assertThat(errors.get(0)).isEqualTo("[2行, 5列] : 項目「郵便番号」の値（0011111）は、郵便番号の形式として不正です。");
97              
98          } finally {
99              csvReader.close();
100         }
101         
102     }
103     
104     @Test
105     public void testReadAnnoError() throws Exception {
106 
107         File file = new File("src/test/data/test_read_external_normal.csv");
108         
109         SuperCsvInvalidAnnotationException exception = assertThrows(SuperCsvInvalidAnnotationException.class, () -> {
110             CsvAnnotationBeanReader<ExternalWrongAnnoCsv> csvReader = new CsvAnnotationBeanReader<>(ExternalWrongAnnoCsv.class,
111                     Files.newBufferedReader(file.toPath(), Charset.forName("UTF-8")),
112                     CsvPreference.STANDARD_PREFERENCE);
113             csvReader.close();
114         });
115         
116         assertThat(exception.getMessage()).isEqualTo("'test.external.ExternalTest$ExternalWrongAnnoCsv' において、アノテーション @CsvColumn の属性 'number' の値（[1]）が重複しています。");
117         
118     }
119     
120     
121     /**
122      * アノテーションの定義間違い。
123      * <p>number が重複
124      *
125      */
126     @CsvBean(header = true)
127     public static class ExternalWrongAnnoCsv {
128         
129         @CsvColumn(number = 1)
130         public String id;
131         
132         @CsvColumn(number = 1)
133         public String name;
134         
135     }
136 }
